content: My name is Young-Hun Oh and you could call me just “Rion”. I am in my last semester in KAIST and from this Fall I am going to study at Carnegie Mellon University. My research interests is systems for machine learning including computer architecture, distributed systems and edge computing.
summary: My name is Young-Hun Oh and you could call me just “Rion”. I am in my last semester in KAIST and from this Fall I am going to study at Carnegie Mellon University.
title: Young Hun Oh

content:
This post is about what I want to study for my graduate study. The following topics are the ones I am currently interested in:
 AI that can reason AI on edge devices (specially on smartphones) System for continual learning Application: Artificial Intelligence in healthcare  1. Reasoning AI 2. AI on Edge Devices 3. System for Continual Learning 4. Application: AI in Healthcare
